column4: that's actually a whole script, just written as one line. You'll have to rewrite it in reverse.
Well I see that it ran sudo apt-get dist-upgrade. Is that what would install all those packages?
no, upgrade won't typically install a bunch of new packages as far as I know. The *next* command installs new stuff though

I'm guessing the ubuntu-desktop package is the one that comes with all the packages. If I were to remove ubuntu-desktop would it revert to what I had previously or would it remove essential things as well?
